summary: Do you know the complicated history of the Captain Marvels ? - 1940:  Captain Marvel (alias of Billy Batson, a kid transformed...
caption:
Do you know the complicated history of the Captain Marvels ?

- 1940:  Captain Marvel (alias of Billy Batson, a kid transformed by magic) appeared in Whiz Comics, published by Fawcett Comics.  In the mid 1940′s, he is the most popular superhero in the US (more than Superman), selling more than 1,4 million copies an issue.  Fawcett created an entire family of spin-off characters.  

- 1940′s:  DC Comics sued Fawcett, alleging Captain Marvel was too similar to Superman (even if their alter ego, Clark Kent and Billy Batson, are very different).  After a long legal dispute, DC won in 1951.  At this time, the super-heroes popularity was declining, Fawcett abandoned the fight.  They paid $400,000 in damages to DC and cancelled all their super-hero publications in 1953.

- 1966 :  A small company, M.F. Enterprise, created a new character, an alien robot named Captain Marvel, not very popular or memorable.   Marvel Comics (previously  known as Atlas Comics, they changed their name in 1961) didn’t like the apparition of a hero named “Marvel” outside of their publications.  They  convinced M.F. Enterprises to cease their series after five issues, paying M.F. a settlement of $4,500.

- 1967:  Marvel Comics saw an opportunity to license the “Captain Marvel” name, so they created a new hero, a Kree officer, Captain Mar-Vell.  To keep the rights, Marvel had to publish the title at least once every two years since, leading to a number of ongoing series, limited series, and one-shots featuring a range of characters using the Captain Marvel alias.

- 1967: In a Captain Marvel (Mar-Vell) story, first appearance of Carol Danvers, an Air Force officer.  In a 1977 comic, she acquired super powers and became Ms. Marvel.  In 2012, she became the new Captain Marvel.

- 1972: DC Comics licensed the Fawcett characters and added them to their universe.  But Marvel had the rights for the title “Captain Marvel”, so DC renamed their book Shazam !   In a 2011 relaunch, Shazam became the official alias of Billy Batson.  

- 2019: Release of a Shazam! (Billy Batson) film and a Captain Marvel (Carol Danvers) film.  Both films are an attempt to add something new to their respective universe: a lighter film for the DCEU and a leading super heroine for the MCU.  

source: Toonopedia and wikipedia articles about the various “Captain Marvel”.

title: Captain Marvel Teaser
description:
Captain Marvel Teaser Trailer Thoughts with Morgan McNair

On this week’s episode of Marvelous Geeks, Morgan’s back to talk all things the Captain Marvel teaser trailer, a little bit of Avengers 4 speculation, and the usual fangirl emotions. [Edit: In the podcast we mention Oscar winning stars and get it completely wrong. In my defense, I think I was thinking of the Avengers?! Lol! So, before anyone points it out, we know. Oops. That’s 100% my bad for spacing. My facts weren’t straight. (Gissane’s.) Also, Okoye and W’Kabi’s marriage confirmation was from a deleted scene! Who else remembers facts when it’s no longer recording!]

tags: im sorry but so many people are bashing on ma girl brie
and she deserves better and a chance
summary: my sister just said brie larson is the most average looking girl and that any blonde chick could play captain marvel and make...
question: my sister just said brie larson is the most average looking girl and that any blonde chick could play captain marvel and make her good,,,,,,thoughts on this?
answer:
listen

brie larson is a fantastic actress with a huge repertoire of amazing performances, and i have never once been disappointed with marvel’s casting. i’ve been apprehensive sure, but i’ve always trusted their judgement, and that’s always been the right call. 

i have to admit that i was doubtful about brie larson at the beginning, but she seems so dedicated to the role, and her trailer was fucking awesome, so i really do think she’ll do captain marvel justice. 

and your sister saying that any blonde chick could play captain marvel…i’m sorry but that’s the biggest load of bollocks i’ve ever heard. go ahead and cast amy schumer as captain marvel, and you tell me whether you agree with your sister.

and not only do i think brie is attractive, but who on earth said superheroes had to be supermodels? if i want supermodels, i’ll watch the paris fashion week live-stream

blog.name: thoseguysontheradio
blog.title: Hey guys...
blog.description:
This is Those Guys!
Those Guys on the Radio is the podcast division of TG Productions. They are based primarily out of New York City. They strive to bring you quality content, mostly consisting of reviews and discussions of professional wrestling, anime and manga, American comic books, video games, and television shows, both animated and live action.
TG Productions also has a let's play division called Those Guys Play, where they play video games from every platform! 
Like us on Facebook!
Those Guys on the Radio
Follow us on Twitter! 
Follow @ThoseGuysRadio
And like us on Instagram!

summary: Hellboy To Take On Shazam At The Box Office Next April
title: Hellboy To Take On Shazam At The Box Office Next April
body:
Hellboy To Take On Shazam At The Box Office Next April

Hellboy has abandoned its January 2019 release for a more competitive field, the April time-frame now considered part of the summer box office season.

According to The Hollywood Reporter, Hellboy will open on April 12th, one week after Warner Bros’ Shazam! opens on April 5th. Its a box office title bout with two big, red opponents. Though no reason has been given for the change in release,…

View On WordPress
